title: The Third man [study extract]
creator_credit: Rank Organisation Film Productions, Society for Education in Film and Television and Carol Reed
brief_description: A study extract prepared by the British Film Institute from the feature film in which Martens is finally convinced that Harry Lime is a black market racketeer.
